content: Bongwonsa Temple, easy to access in the middle of Seoul!!! You can walk about 15 minutes from Ahyeon by going up to Ansan.
The small temple is quiet and elegant.
Bongwonsa Temple is located in Ansan (Mountain). This is the head temple of the Taego Order of Korean Buddhism. It's easy to get to from the hiking trails of Ansan and nearby neighborhoods.

A working temple and home of the Taegyo order of Korean Buddhism, this temple on the side of Mt. Ansan (a small mountain in central Seoul) is seldom visited by tourists, but the setting and temple buildings are lovely. After visiting, hike 20 minutes up the hill through woods to the lookout at the top of Mt. Ansan: the views over the city are spectacular.

If you walk through Ansan and want to meet a Korean Buddhist temple that is unfrequently visited by tourists, this is your opportunity. The temple is very beautiful but also super quiet and if you have luck you can be present some authentic ceremony away from the many curiosous that are in the city centre.
Every year on June 6th, there is a ceremony called Yeongsanjae. It is also registered in UNESCO. You must go and see it.

Because I was on the early morning plane, I arrived in Seoul just in the early morning and was close to the sky, so I went to the sweat curtain for a bubble at the first stop and slept to relieve the fatigue of the plane. The sweat curtain is actually similar to a sauna, which is very popular in South Korea. You can experience the bathing culture of Korea here. After buying the ticket, you can go in and experience clothes and towels. There are two parts of bathing and sweating. The bath is separated from men and women, and sweating is public. There is also a place to sleep in the public area, just take a cushion and find a quiet place to sleep. If you are staying for a short stay, you can choose to come here, which is much cheaper than staying in a hotel.

I went to Senil to Korea. A short walk from the highway terminal GO TO MALL. It is also famous as a viewing spot such as fireworks and drone shows on the Han River. It is recommended to go at dusk.

From Ruyi Island to Qingchuan Stream, a man-made stream in downtown Seoul, which was once closed by subway, it is now a sight of the city again. Although it is a bit common, it can add poetic flavor to merge the soft flowing water into the tall buildings. Nearby Fashion Square food and shopping paradise ah. Guanghua Gate Square is also nearby, together wandering all day.

The Qingxi River Museum is close to Guanghua Gate Park. Walking along the stream, you can find that Qingxi River is Seoul's most successful sewage treatment project. It is now open for free. Every night, many people walk here. There are many cafes, restaurants and shops along the coast.

The Qing Xichuan Museum is a modern venue, mainly for young people. It was opened on June 10, 1994 for the purpose of collecting, preserving and displaying historical materials of the Korean War in past dynasties.
Now it seems that the environment here is good. Who can think how bad the environment here was before? It's a museum about environmental governance. It's worth learning from.

Qingxi River was originally a canal in Seoul, Korea. Its water source came from the Hanjiang River. For a long time, the pollution on both sides of the river was serious. Its stench and disorder had to be covered up by the city government. Later, after transformation, it became one of the most beautiful places in Seoul.
You can learn a lot about the development of this project. Long changes require great determination.
You can see the history of Qingxichuan's development, from a wasteland to the current urban greening
Qingxi River from a stinky puddle to the present tourist attractions really put a lot of effort.
Here is the history of Qingxi River, the process of transformation, you can go to understand.
